description.@en: To call me overprepared is a vast understatement; I’m ready for anything you throw my way.

system.notes:
Commoner Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically run-of-the-mill people, taking on regular jobs. Their occupations may vary by culture, but they live by the philosophy that hard work will ensure a bountiful, healthy and productive life.

effect.@en: Providing you can narratively justify it, you can substitute any Primary Attribute in place of another when making a Skill Test.
